fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces

Interface ExecutionStateI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface ExecutionStateI
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface ExecutionStateI declares the methods used to access request execution state information for processing requests.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-12-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToCurrentResult(QueryResultI result)
      merge result with the currently accumulated result for the request.
      QueryResultI getCurrentResult()
      return the currently accumulated query result.
      java.util.Set<Direction> getDirections()
      return the directions of this directional continuation.
      ProcessingNodeI getProcessingNode()
      access to the current node for processing the request.
      void incrementHops()
      increment the number of hops made since the initial receiving node.
      boolean isDirectional()
      return true if this continuation is of type directional.
      boolean isFlooding()
      return true if this continuation is of type flooding.
      boolean noMoreHops()
      return true if no more hops can be made after the current sensor node.
      void updateProcessingNode(ProcessingNodeI pn)
      update the processing node in the execution state.
      boolean withinMaximalDistance(PositionI p)
      return true if p is within the maximal distance for this continuation.

        Contract

 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:

      • addToCurrentResult

        void addToCurrentResult(QueryResultI result)
        merge result with the currently accumulated result for the request.

        Contract

         pre     getCurrentResult().isBooleanRequest() == result.isBooleanRequest() && getCurrentResult().isGatherRequest() == result.isGatherRequest()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        result - query result to be added to the currently accumulated one.
